title: Re-installing Game - Error when installing C++ 2005 Redistributable *please help*
body:
I am consistently getting an error when installing the prerequisite software C++.  I reformatted my computer and am in the process of getting all my programs back.  Will post a screenshot of the error soon.

**Any input greatly appreciated!**

replies.body:
Thanks for the reply Proocles. 
*I think things are running smoothly now. 
I tried downloading C++ from the Microsoft website but unfortunately got the same error.   I recalled another program I use (for Online Poker) requiring the same pre-requisite software so I opened that program (Hold'em Manager 2) and updated and closed it.  I had previously manually deleted the C++ 2005 from my computer, thinking it would fix the error with the LoL installer. 
I guess something collided with the two programs.

Anyway, everything is working, league is updating now.  See you guys on the Rift.  GL HF. <3

This can be a common error when you have a new or reformatted computer, and usually a windows update will fix this up.  You can also download the windows product manually here:  [Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  Hopefully, that will get you squared away!
